name: TOPAMAX 25
treatmentDescriptions: In adjunctive therapy of adults and children (from 2 years) with partial seizures and generalized tonic-clonic seizures. In adjunctive therapy of seizures with Lennox-Gastaut syndrome in adults and children. Topamax is indicated as monotherapy in patients with newly diagnosed epilepsy in children aged 7 years and above or for conversion to monotherapy in patients with epilepsy. Topamax is indicated in adults for the prevention of migraines. The use of Topamax in the acute treatment of migraine has not been studied.
warnings: תרופה מוגבלת לרישום ע'י רופא מומחה או הגבלה אחרת

aiResolution.reasoning: The option "TOPAMAX 25" matches the medication "TOPAMAX 100" in terms of brand name similarity, registration number, and strength compatibility. The only difference is in the strength, which can be attributed to a different dosage form or concentration.
